properties.areaDesc: Waters from Cascade Head to Florence OR from 10 to 60 nm; Coastal waters from Cascade Head to Florence OR out 10 nm
properties.headline: Small Craft Advisory issued January 16 at 12:14AM PST until January 16 at 11:00AM PST by NWS Portland OR
properties.description:
* WHAT...West winds 15 to 20 kt with gusts up to 25 kt and seas
16 to 20 feet at 13 seconds.

* WHERE...Coastal waters from Cascade Head to Florence OR out 10
NM and Waters from Cascade Head to Florence OR from 10 to 60 NM.

* WHEN...Until 11 AM PST this morning.

* IMPACTS...Conditions will be hazardous to small craft.

* ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Isolated gusts to 40 kt possible at times.
properties.instruction:
Inexperienced mariners, especially those operating smaller
vessels, should avoid navigating in hazardous conditions.

This Small Craft Advisory means that wind speeds of 21 to 33
knots are expected to produce hazardous wave conditions to small
craft. Inexperienced mariners, especially those operating smaller
vessels should avoid navigating in these conditions.

NWSheadline: SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 AM PST THIS MORNING... ...GALE WARNING IS CANCELLED
